SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rs, p.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT d.data_id as dataId , d.title as title , d.registrate_date as registrateDate , d.attachment_group_id as attachmentGroupId , d.emp_id as empId , d.department_id as departmentId , d.remarks as remarks , a.upload_path as uploadPath , a.upload_file_name as uploadFileName , a.origin_file_name as originFileName , a.file_size as fileSize , a.ext as ext , a.file_id as fileId , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY d.data_id ORDER BY d.data_id DESC) as rn FROM data_room d INNER JOIN attachment a ON d.attachment_group_id = a.attachment_group_id
ORDER BY data_id DESC) p WHERE p.rn = 1 AND rownum <= (#{page}) * (#{cnt})) WHERE rs > (#{page}-1) * (#{cnt})
SELECT count(*) FROM data_room d INNER JOIN attachment a ON d.attachment_group_id = a.attachment_group_id

SELECT d.data_id , d.title , d.registrate_date , a.upload_path , a.upload_file_name , a.origin_file_name , a.attachment_group_id , a.file_size , a.ext , a.file_id FROM data_room d INNER JOIN attachment a ON d.attachment_group_id = a.attachment_group_id WHERE data_id = #{dataId}
